--- id: tahnelian-airborne-imperial-guard title: Imperial Guard – Tahnelian Airborne name: Tahnelian Airborne Imperial Guard introduction: | forces: - tahnelian-airborne - imperial-navy - titan-legion using_the_army_list: | The following army list allows you to field an Imperial Guard army that is based on an Tahnelian Airborne regiment. It can also be used as a stand in army list for other Imperial Guard drop troop regiments, such as Elysian Drop Troops, Garlatan Drop Legion or Mistian Para-Troops, among many others. Tahnelian Airborne formations come in two types: _platoons_ and _support formations_. Each platoon you include in the army allows you to field any two support formations. Although you can only take a support formation if you first take a platoon, they are treated as separate independent formations during a battle and do not have to move around together. In addition, platoons may be given up to three upgrades. Each type of upgrade can only be taken once by a platoon. Upgrades are added to the platoon and are not a separate formation. Support formations may not be given platoon upgrades. Each upgrade that is taken adds to the cost of the platoon, as shown on the upgrade chart. Tahnelian Airborne Imperial Guard armies may be supported by Imperial Navy aircraft and Titan Legion battlegroups. A maximum of up to a third of the points available to the army may be spent on these formations. special_rules: - commissars ---

Tahnelian Airborne Imperial Guard armies have a strategy rating of 2. Titan Legion battlegroup formations have an initiative rating of 1+. All other formations have an initiative rating of 2+.

Tahnelian Airborne Platoons
Formation Units Cost
0–1 Command Platoon One Supreme Commander unit and eight Infantry units 300 points
(add five Valkyries) (+175 points)
Infantry Platoon One Commander unit and eight Infantry units 200 points
(add five Valkyries) (+175 points)
Tahnelian Airborne Upgrades
(Up to three upgrades may be taken once per platoon.)
Upgrade Units Cost
Heavy Weapon Squads Add up to four of any of the following units: Fire Support Squad, Mortar Squad +35 points each
Infantry Squads Add two or four Infantry units +25 or +50 points
Sentinels Add up to three Drop Sentinels +25 points each
Special Weapon Squads Add up to two Snipers +25 points each
Tauros Add up to three of any of the following units: Tauros, Tauros Venator +25 points each
Note: All units in a platoon must be transported in Valkyries or Valkyrie Sky Talons if any are taken. Valkyries cost +35 points each and Valkyrie Sky Talons cost +25 points each. You may not take more than the minimum number required to transport the formation.
Tahnelian Airborne Support Formations
(Any two support formations may be fielded per each platoon.)
Formation Units Cost
0–1 Orbital Support Any one of the following units: Lunar Class Cruiser 150 points
Emperor Class Battleship 200 points
Storm Trooper Platoon Eight Storm Troopers 200 points
(add four Valkyries) (+150 points)
Vulture Squadron Four Vultures 300 points
Imperial Ally Formations
(Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.)
Imperial Navy Aircraft
Formation Units Cost
Marauder Squadron Two Marauder Bombers 250 points
Thunderbolt Squadron Two Thunderbolt Fighters 150 points
Titan Legion Battlegroups
Formation Units Cost
Reaver One Reaver Class Titan 650 points
Warhound One Warhound Class Titan 275 points
Warhound Pack Two Warhound Class Titans 500 points
Warlord One Warlord Class Titan 825 points
